TopicTitle: Vote For The Jedi Master's Next Story, Again!

Articles.Content:
All right, the title pretty much sums it up. This will be coming either in August or when .24 comes out, whichever comes first. If it's .24, the updates will be slow because I'm in the grips of Camp NaNoWriMo. With that out of the way, here are the options:

Dark Days: A space race story set eight thousand years before the typical Jedi Space Program canon.

Destination: Moho: The JSP has always had trouble with Moho, but with a grand tour planned for the 240 fiscal year, the Director decides it's time.

The Vall Report: When a mapping probe spots something weird at the south pole of Vall, Jeb and friends are sent to investigate.

Athena Base: A small Mun base becomes ripe with intrigue when a monolith is decoded and the team is sent on a giant scavenger hunt. Someone isn't coming home next rotation...

The Brianna Chronicles: The Brianna One mothership is sent out to Jool to land on all its moons in one go. Jool-V Challenge submission.

Be sure to vote, and feel free to leave your comments, as well as your own ideas.
From the options there, I think the third, or last one has the most potential.
Athena base sounds good, I was just drooling dreaming of something along those lines, weird!
The vote is very close, keep voting people!
Voted for Dark Days since I'm a sucker for origin / alternative history stories. My second vote, if I had it, would go to Athena Base.
Keep working on yer Forum Plays XCOM thing.

Keep working on yer Forum Plays XCOM thing.

I am.

Keep voting, people!
Dark Days won! Prologue should come shortly after 0.24 comes (which is not long!).
